ygData.subject: Re: my 2 cents
ygData.msgSnippet: In beast wars they could transform without saying thier word, beast machines seem to have a different approach to it.Rattrap seemed almost adicted to his beast

In beast wars they could transform without saying thier word, beast 
machines seem to have a different approach to it.Rattrap seemed 
almost adicted to his beast mode in the first however many episodes, 
he doubted his abilities as a bot so subconsiously he stayed a rat. 
(Unfortunately later on he transformed into an ugly  rollabot.)The 
first time they transform is the only time I recall that it's 
necessary to say the words.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> But then how come Rattrap was having trouble transforming?  When 
Rattrap
> was having troubles transforming, people kept telling him he had to
> actually mean it.
> 
> ----------
> > From: cyberwolf4@p...
> > To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > Subject: my 2 cents
> > Date: August 9, 2000 2:22 PM
> > 
> > Hey, they didn't use thier catch phrase every time they 
transformed. 
> > it seemed more like a battle cry then a keyword.
> > 
> > -- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> > > But, Also note that in Beast Machines the term they use is "I Am
> > > Transformed"
> > > 
> > > ----------
> > > > From: logomorph@h...
> > > > To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > > > Subject: Re: Jumping In
> > > > Date: August 8, 2000 3:01 PM
> > > > 
> > > > (OK, first of all, you have to deside if you want to be a 
good 
> > guy, 
> > > > bad guy or neutral.  If your good=Maximal, the transformation 
> > term is 
> > > > Maximize, that turns you from beast mode into bot mode.
> > > > The bad=Predacon guy term is Terrorize.
> > > > If your neutral, you pick one or the other, but play your 
> > character 
> > > > as you see fit and not by what a normal faction member may be 
> > like.)
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > ::GoldenEye::
> > > > 
> > > > She smiled at the sqirrel.  She knew that this was an 
oppertunity 
> > > > just dropped into her lap by the Matrix.
> > > > "Well, war is never right.  But we are all at war right now.  
> > It's 
> > > > Kill Or Be Killed right now.  If you want to stay alive, 
better 
> > come 
> > > > with me.  I have a safe spot to stay at rigt now." she smiled 
a 
> > > > sincere smile. "I was programmed as a Predacon. But don't let 
> > that 
> > > > bother you.  I don't go by my symbol.  I follow my spark."
> > > > She thought, if she only had a spark. 
> > > > 
> > > > "Well, you can pick sides later. I don't really mind what 
side 
> > you 
> > > > take.  Just as long as we are frinds." She smiled. "Ah, would 
you 
> > > > like to go to my nest or go fishing first?"
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Danielle Laing <sky_duv@y...> 
wrote:
> > > > > Tails nodded, and said loudly-
> > > > > "Transform!" 
> > > > > She was a squirrel once again.
> > > > > "Alright, now I should change back...Transform!"
> > > > > Tails studied herself. She seemed to now be
> > > > > half-metal, half squirrel. Armor plating, an armor
> > > > > head-piece, an..armored tail with a single spike at
> > > > > the end, and armor on her fore-arms and legs.
> > > > > "Um..wow!"
> > > > > She cocked her head and stared at Goldeneye.
> > > > > "Well, what side are you on? I don't know which I
> > > > > would choose...war isn't right, in the first place.
> > > > > And where are we going, anyway?"
> > > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > >
